com.tencent.tcr.sdk.api

接口 VideoFrameBufferCallback


  • public interface VideoFrameBufferCallback
    Customize the video data frame callback to call back the raw video data byte stream before decoding. Set the callback to decode and render the screen by itself after getting the data

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onMediaCodecFormat(java.lang.String mimeType, int width, int height)
      MediaFormat initialization parameters
      void onVideoBufferCallback(java.nio.ByteBuffer byteBuffer, int width, int height, long captureTimeNs)
      Video frame data callback.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onVideoBufferCallback

        void onVideoBufferCallback(java.nio.ByteBuffer byteBuffer,
                           int width,
                           int height,
                           long captureTimeNs)
        Video frame data callback.
        Note: When the resolution is changed and the initial setting of the decoder is different, please handle it according to the decoder you are using
        参数:
        byteBuffer - video frame data byte stream
        width - Video frame resolution width
        height - Video frame resolution height
        captureTimeNs - Video frame data display timestamp, unit NS

      • onMediaCodecFormat

        void onMediaCodecFormat(java.lang.String mimeType,
                        int width,
                        int height)
        MediaFormat initialization parameters
        参数:
        mimeType - Decoding type, H264 value is video/avc
        width - Decoder initial setting width
        height - Decoder initial setting height
